entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 8 except minus 13 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8 except minus 13 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 05 March 2023
